items.content_html: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.
items.title: Ghulam-Ali-Khan/Authify: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.

items.content_html: EZ-Shop API is a lightweight, testing-focused platform for developers. It allows easy API key generation, product browsing, searching, posting, and rating‚Äîall without sign-up. Perfect for experimenting with basic eCommerce functionality.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library that simplifies the creation of structured data objects. It offers a type-safe and flexible API for defining and initializing classes with custom properties and behaviors, making it easier to manage complex data structures in TypeScript projects.
items.title: AndreyMork/domistrukt: A lightweight TypeScript library that simplifies the creation of structured data objects. It offers a type-safe and flexible API for defining and initializing classes with custom properties and behaviors, making it easier to manage complex data structures in TypeScript projects.

items.content_html: Drizzle ORM is a lightweight TypeScript-first ORM designed for optimal type safety and SQL query generation, making database interactions straightforward and reliable. It emphasizes simplicity and minimal runtime overhead, making it a good choice for modern TypeScript projects.
items.title: abhik1289/drizzle_learning:  Drizzle ORM is a lightweight TypeScript-first ORM designed for optimal type safety and SQL query generation, making database interactions straightforward and reliable. It emphasizes simplicity and minimal runtime overhead, making it a good choice for modern TypeScript projects.

items.content_html: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.
items.title: bids24/Kalpanix: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
items.title: Heiko-Lemmert/join-project: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
